content:
# Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Setup at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving iron ore
- Stone furnace (position x1) receiving coal
- Stone furnace (position x2) receiving coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces are available and not busy before inserting items. Check the status of the furnaces to avoid unnecessary insertions.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnaces have finished processing. Verify the output before attempting to extract.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh the entity data to ensure that you have the latest information about the structures and their statuses on the map.
